name: Space Avenger – Empire of Nexx
description:
Space Avenger is super fast paced top down arena shooter with multiple ships and tons of upgrading options that will help you in your war against the Empire of Nexx. Traverse intense battles across multiple worlds as you attempt to push the Nexx back and save your people!

Features:

  • Superfast science fiction arcade arena shooter!
  • Extraterrestrial firepower, weapons and upgrades!
  • An awesome SciFi story full of suspense and action!
  • Multiple ship types
  • Deep ship upgrade system for custom combat styles
